Fanshi ni [mu sheng] suo zhaohuan bai ouxiang zhe de, tamen gandao nanyu renshou. An la xuanze tasuo yiyu zhe zunxing zhengjiao, yindao gui xin [bing shuncong] zhe zunxing zheng jiao.
